Package mypackage

Class Indexer

java.lang.Object
mypackage.Indexer
public class Indexer
extends java.lang.Object
Indexer class is used for indexing the file and cutting it to words. Statistics can be exported through this class and searches can be done.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static int BUFFER_SIZE
    Member variable which determines the size of the byte array of a word entry.
    private java.util.LinkedList<FileLine> fileLines
    Member variable for storing the list of lines coming from the commander
    private java.util.Vector<WordEntry> fileWords
    Member variable for storing a vector containing all the words of the file and the number in which each of them was found
    private boolean indexingCreated
    A boolean variable for keeping track of when the indexing file has been created.
    private java.lang.String indexingPath
    The path in which the indexing file will be created
    private java.util.List<java.lang.String> lineWords
    Member variable for storing the word entries of a line while iterating through the list of lines
    private static int MAX_WORD_SIZE
    Static member variable that sets the maximum size of a word to be sorted.
    private static int MIN_WORD_SIZE
    Static member variable that sets the minimum size of a word in order to be taken into account when sorting the file and spliting it to words.
    private static int PAGE_SIZE
    Member variable which determines the size of a disk virtual page size.
    private StandardReader reader
    A reader object used for reading console input
    private boolean sorted
    A boolean variable for keeping track of when the words of the file have been sorted.

    • MAX_WORD_SIZE

      private static final int MAX_WORD_SIZE
      Static member variable that sets the maximum size of a word to be sorted. If the word length exceeds this number, it is being adjusted to it.

    • setIndexingCreated

      public void setIndexingCreated​(boolean indexingCreated)
      Method for assigning a boolean value to the indexingCreated variable which indicates if the indexing file is created or not.
      Parameters:
      indexingCreated -

    • parseWords

      private void parseWords()
      Method used to split each line of the file in words, insert them into a list and sort them lexicographically. By iterating through the list we collect the words of each line using special delimiters and cases, then we insert them into a list and at the end we have a vector containing all the words from the whole file.

    • print

      public void print()
      Method used to print the indexing file by gradually reading pages from it and converting them to lists and finally printing them.

    • binarySearch

      public void binarySearch()
      Method used to search for entries in the file using a binary search algorithm. The entries we look for correspond to a specific search term that the user provided before the search begins.s The algorithm is NOT optimized and some entries might be lost or omitted!

    • searchInPage

      public java.util.List<WordEntry> searchInPage​(java.util.List<WordEntry> entries, java.lang.String termToSearch)
      This method is used to search serially for entries containing a specific word in a given list of entries. It returns a list containing any entries matching our requirements.
      Parameters:
      entries - The list containing various word entries
      termToSearch - The word whose entries we are searching for
      Returns:
      List containing any found entries

    • serialSearch

      public void serialSearch()
      Method used to search for entries in the file using a serial search algorithm. The entries we look for correspond to a specific search term that the user provided before the search begins. The serial serial stops when it finds a page containing words that are lexicographically more than the term provided in order to minimize the number of meaningless disk accesses

    • writeIndexFile

      public void writeIndexFile​(java.lang.String path)
      Method used to write the indexing file page by page to the disk
      Parameters:
      path - The canonical path in which the indexing file will be created

    • readWord

      private java.lang.String readWord()
      Method used to read and validate input from the console using a StandardReader object
      Returns:
      String : the term whose entries are going to be searched
